title: Sugar beet production in the U.S. 2000 to 2019
summary: In general Production in thousand tons has rose over the Year.
Production in thousand tons is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Production in thousand tons, of value 35371.0 was reached at Year 2015
Minimum Production in thousand tons about 31285.0 was reached at Year 2014
min_summary: Overall Production in thousand tons has increased over the Year.
Production in thousand tons is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015.
